This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] showPopover and hidePopover should work on the select datalist.
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "NotSupportedError: Failed to execute 'showPopover' on 'HTMLElement': Not supported on elements that do not have a valid value for the 'popover' attribute."
[FAIL] showPicker should show the select datalist.
  assert_true: expected true got false
[FAIL] preventDefault on beforetoggle should prevent the datalist from showing.
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "NotAllowedError: Failed to execute 'showPicker' on 'HTMLSelectElement': showPicker() requires a user gesture."
[FAIL] showPopover on a disconnected datalist should throw an exception.
  assert_throws_dom: function "() => datalist.showPopover()" threw object "NotSupportedError: Failed to execute 'showPopover' on 'HTMLElement': Not supported on elements that do not have a valid value for the 'popover' attribute." that is not a DOMException InvalidStateError: property "code" is equal to 9, expected 11
[FAIL] Disconnecting while internally showing the datalist should not crash or show the popover.
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "NotSupportedError: Failed to execute 'showPicker' on 'HTMLSelectElement': showPicker() requires the select is rendered."
[FAIL] Disconnecting while internally hiding the datalist should not crash.
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "NotSupportedError: Failed to execute 'showPopover' on 'HTMLElement': Not supported on elements that do not have a valid value for the 'popover' attribute."
Harness: the test ran to completion.
